scripts.create:db:dev:windows: SET NODE_ENV=development& dotenv -e .env.local sequelize db:create && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate
scripts.create:db:dev:mac: export NODE_ENV=development& dotenv -e .env.local sequelize db:create && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate
scripts.create:db:dev:mac:seed: export NODE_ENV=development& dotenv -e .env.local sequelize db:create && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all --debug
scripts.reset:db:dev:mac: export NODE_ENV=development& sequelize db:create && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo:all && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate
scripts.reset:db:dev:mac:seed: export NODE_ENV=development& sequelize db:create && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo:all && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all --debug
scripts.reset:db:dev:windows: SET NODE_ENV=development& sequelize db:create && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo:all && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate
